I got a monster to start with 5 techs!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Studio (Combining/Breeding): I got a monster to start with 5 techs!
By Infernus on Sunday, August 17, 2003 - 08:26 pm:

I took a second gen Krsnik(untrained) and a 1st gen SunsetGali(Untrained). Here's what happened...

Krsnik-P:154 I:93 A:122 S:72 D:184 L:112
SunsetGali-Password:LEFRESHH-P:143 I:176 A:135 S:120 D:83 L:95

Result: SunsetGali-P:125 I:180 A:130 S:115 D:80 L:100-Techs:Fire Wall,FlyingMask,Lightning,Heavy Blow,Red Wisp

From my findings ANY second gen or higher monster combined with this SunsetGali(any gen) will make a SunsetGali with these 5 techs. This makes for a great monster to train considering Sunsets life is so high and it's statgains are decent(According to Jimeous' findings).

By Magnus on Sunday, August 17, 2003 - 09:22 pm:

kewl

By Infernus on Sunday, August 17, 2003 - 09:31 pm:

When I said life I meant lifespan, before anyone thinks otherwise...

By Pattongeneral on Sunday, August 17, 2003 - 09:54 pm:

When you combine something woth a gali...it is almost always like that.....a normal gali (1st Gen.) Starts with 3 stats, I think.

By Infernus on Sunday, August 17, 2003 - 11:04 pm:

Most start off with 3, not 5, this is 2 more, which is much better.

By Seize on Wednesday, August 20, 2003 - 08:14 pm:

Recieving the first 5 techs:
Fire Wall, FlyingMask, Lightning, Red Whisp, Heavy Blow
...happens every time I combine monsters and use the Gali Mask item. This is partly due to the fact that at least one moster in my combinations has been trained (just due to the freezer occupants I have). But 5 techs makes this combination the best I've seen.
